author: Lyzza
title: More attacks against Planned Parenthood and women's health clinics...
text: Posts: 1,353 More attacks against Planned Parenthood and women's health clinics... Crazy. Louisiana and Texas are both trying to screw Planned Parenthood over those idiotic videos. Whatever. Independent women's clinics and abortion providers are also under heavy assault from anti-choice freaks, and many are standing up to this threat and sounding off on the good things they do for women and their communities. Quote: Originally Posted by Lyzza Crazy. Louisiana and Texas are both trying to screw Planned Parenthood over those idiotic videos. Whatever. Independent women's clinics and abortion providers are also under heavy assault from anti-choice freaks, and many are standing up to this threat and sounding off on the good things they do for women and their communities. 'We Are Not Ashamed': How Abortion Providers Are Pushing Back Against Stigma and Intimidation | Common Dreams | Breaking News & Views for the Progressive Community Good shut em down, lying, despicable, baby part selling ghouls. I am for women's right to Birth control, let their Doctor supply it and they pay for it! If not use a condom or some other form if you get pregnant, you knew the risks. Quote: Originally Posted by Lyzza Crazy. Louisiana and Texas are both trying to screw Planned Parenthood over those idiotic videos. Whatever. Independent women's clinics and abortion providers are also under heavy assault from anti-choice freaks, and many are standing up to this threat and sounding off on the good things they do for women and their communities. 'We Are Not Ashamed': How Abortion Providers Are Pushing Back Against Stigma and Intimidation | Common Dreams | Breaking News & Views for the Progressive Community They want to fill their foster care programs to get money from the government to house them. We have NEVER had so many children in foster care as we have since the born again evangelicals started with their tax funded faith based foster care programs. They LIVE off the government teat, using children as their cash crop.
